MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G51 postcode area of Glasgow. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12:35pm following reports of safety concern on our underground cable network on Arklet Road and this may affect the supply to your property. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of onsite delays and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:40pm on 15th of January 2021.
